data.title: List of Tamils of Sri Lanka
data.meta_description: This is a List of Tamils of Sri Lanka by their country of domicile or origin. All communities that speak Tamil or spoke Tamil and originally came from Sri Lanka are included. Tamils of Sri Lanka today are a trans national minority and are found…
